body:
Thanks for creating this issue and sorry about the regression! You are quite likely right that it's because of the latest goja changes. :disappointed: 

We'll investigate and hopefully create a fix soon. It's also quite interesting that the Babel transformation times became longer when we disabled some of the plugins... :confused: Certainly deserves some investigation, it might be the case that the new goja version itself is slower in executing Babel, we have to check :man_shrugging:

issue.title: Using of rest argument binding in inner function, breaks it

repository.name: k6
repository.description: A modern load testing tool, using Go and JavaScript
